Question: Shenzhen Zond Technology Co.,Ltd. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Zondoo Electric Scooters

- ZO03 fast electric scooter, redefining off-road scooter riding
- ZO01 plus 5600W 55MPH electric scooter for fast and furious rides
- Zondoo electric scooters for adults, offering sheer riding pleasure
- Zondoo ZO03 Plus 11inch off-road electric scooter
- Wide wheel electric scooter for off-road experiences
- Zondoo electric scooter distributor opportunities in the USA & EU, with big surprises
- Off-road electric scooter for experiencing speed and passion
